title: SL and TL T206's ALL SOLD
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: SL and TL T206's ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi, I would like to sell 6 SL and TL cards.  Prices include shipping and Delivery Confirmation.  I will include insurance for orders over $50.  PayPal is preferred, with no fees, but personal checks and money orders are no problem.  PM's are fine or emails to [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url].

Thank you,
Rick

Bastian       $40  Price reduced to $35
Ellam          $45  Price reduced to $40
Manion       SOLD  Thank you!
Miller          $35  Price reduced to $30
Molesworth  SOLD   Thank you!
Rockenfeld   SOLD   Thank you!
